anathema: Undermine a rightful ruler, knowingly serve a usurper
edict: Protect those you have authority over, maintain harmony in your community
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Horus (The Distant Falcon)](/Deities.aspx?ID=516)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 312

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dead or Missing Deities](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=34)

**Edicts** Protect those you have authority over, maintain harmony in your community

**Anathema** Undermine a rightful ruler, knowingly serve a usurper

**Area of Concern**
Rulership, the sky, the sun

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39)

**Favored Weapon** [Khopesh](/Weapons.aspx?ID=476)

**Domains** [Air](/Domains.aspx?ID=65), [Moon](/Domains.aspx?ID=84), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=92)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Carryall](/Spells.aspx?ID=1972)

- **3rd**
[Wall of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=1753)

- **4th**
[Aerial Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=1437)
(bird only)

</column>
name: Horus (The Distant Falcon)
